pages.title: Fluid Shifter
pages.text: <item>Fluid Shifters/$ are the fluid version of <item>$(l:essentials/item_shifter)item shifters/$, having a small internal tank. They eject any liquid into machines/inventories on the front. They cannot eject fluids into the world.$(br2)A line of <item>transport chutes/$ can be attached to the front to allows ejecting
fluids to an inventory several blocks away (default limit: 16).$(br2)<item>Fluid shifters/$ are handy for moving fluids cheaply and quickly, including upwards.$(br2)
